summary:
Allows you to fly dragons!
YES THAT\"S RIGHT IT ALLOWS YOU TO FLY DRAGONS!
descriptionHtml:
Okay so I was a little misleading in title, this lets you mount a dragon and RIDE it, it does not however let you control it, to get it to land simply use the (I forget the name) the shout that lands a dragon.

Installation:
There are no .exe\'s but you do need WinZip/Rar or 7Zip.

Simply extract to skyrim folder and merge and replace blah blah blah.
Download Link (Makes you wait 5 seconds [No survey] this is 4.48MB
adf[DOT]ly/6lt0u
Alternate:
adf[DOT]ly/6ltP5

Will Add Images Soon!!!
(Skyrim currently isn\'t working for me [NOT BECAUSE OF THIS MOD] but I messed up installing a texture pack)
author: TheModMan411
